mapper.select: select * from housedeal as hd inner join houseinfo as hf on hd.aptCode = hf.aptCode where dongCode = #{dongCode}
mapper.insert: insert into housedeal(aptCode, dealAmount, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, floor) values (#{aptCode}, #{dealAmount}, #{dealYear}, #{dealMonth}, #{dealDay}, #{area}, #{floor})
